note: I used to be on that bird site, but I‘ve been Claude Rains since the days of Usenet. Worked 25 years for the PhoneCo, where I learned never to use your real name online (see Yoel Roth, Keith Henson) …Claude Rains was THE INVISIBLE MAN & a corrupt, yet, sadly underpaid Civil Servant in CASABLANCA, and Out Of This World since 1967. Fedora Fan. Reese is My Little Canine Friend, and we ride my bike to the park almost every morning. I favor safer, dedicated bike paths & lanes. #GeneralHospital, #GH.
